article_metadata.description: May 11 — To the Editor:In the May 12 Portsmouth Herald, Senator Kelly Ayotte boasts about her efforts to protect women from breast cancer by maintaining the present federal requirement that “Women who are 40 and older can receive mammograms covered by their health insurance without cost-sharing”, going on to explain that these mammograms help detect breast cancer while it is often curable, saving many, many lives.She does not mention that she is simultaneously a leader in
